import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Navbar from 'react-bootstrap/Navbar' import { Nav,Col,Row,Container,Form} from "react-bootstrap" import navItems from "static/data/menu" const Footer = () => { const [orchestraEnsemble, setOrchestraEnsemble] = useState(postTitle); const [conductor, setConductor] = useState(); const [nameOfPiece, setNameOfPiece] = useState(); const [validated, setValidated] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { // Update the document title using the browser API // eslint-disable-next-line react-hooks/exhaustive-deps }, []); const NavList = () => { return navItems.map(item => { return {item} })} const date = new Date(); const Year = date.getFullYear() return (<>
Send us your concert information:
Orchestra, Ensemble: setOrchestraEnsemble(e.target.value)} /> Please provide a title. Looks good! Conductor setConductor(e.target.value)} /> Please provide a product description. Looks good! Name of Piece: setNameOfPiece(e.target.value)} /> Please provide a product description. Looks good! Date, Time, Location: setConductor(e.target.value)} /> Please provide a product description. Looks good!
{`Â© ${Year} Copyright johandemeij.com`}
) } export default Footer
